str2: By no means, not at all. Intensive of ou; not indeed.
Father, (Heavenly) Father, ancestor, elder, senior. Apparently a primary word; a 'father'.
Abraham, progenitor of the Hebrew race. Of Hebrew origin; Abraham, the Hebrew patriarch.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.
But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.
If. From ei and an; a conditional particle; in case that, provided, etc.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Passive - 3rd Person Singular

str2: To, towards, with. A strengthened form of pro; a preposition of direction; forward to, i.e. Toward.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.
(a) adj: dead, lifeless, subject to death, mortal, (b) noun: a dead body, a corpse. From an apparently primary nekus; dead.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From meta and noieo; to think differently or afterwards, i.e. Reconsider.
